title: Letter from Assistant to the President for Homeland Security and Counterterrorism and National Security Advisor on Southwest Border Security | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 25, 2010

 



Letter from Assistant to the President for Homeland Security and Counterterrorism and National Security Advisor on Southwest Border Security




Attached please find a letter from Assistant to the President for Homeland Security and Counterterrorism John Brennan and National Security Advisor General James Jones to Chairman Levin conveying the President’s decision to provide additional support for strategic and integrated Southwest border security.
